    • Player

      public Player​(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints)
      Constructor to create a Player.
      Parameters:
      name - Name to call the player in the UI
      displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI
      hitPoints - Player's starting number of hitpoints

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn. Overrides Actor.playTurn()
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Menu and actions player is available to perform
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(ActionList, Action, GameMap, Display)
